item.title: Rosanna Pansino Sends MrBeast Allegations To The FBI
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/mrbeast-allegations-fbi/

Rosanna Pansino’s crusade against Jimmy ‘MrBeast’ Donaldson and his team has reached a new level as she forwarded her recent allegations to the FBI for further investigation. It started with Pansino slamming MrBeast’s new ‘Lunchly’ line for containing mould, and now, she has obtained and shared details of a claimed ‘official MrBeast work chat’.

In this chat, thousands of messages are revealed, many of which are ‘inappropriate, especially for a company that targets children’.

Another One

Earlier this year, MrBeast came under scrutiny when ‘Ava Kris Tyson’, a close member of his team, was outed by allegations of ‘sexual messaging with a minor’, which the creator partially admitted to before leaving MrBeast’s production team.

One of the most damning claims from Pansino is that MrBeast must have known about Tyson’s behaviour given the nature of some of the messages and memes shared in the chat she obtained. Per her report in a recent video, she has ‘verified the legitimacy of these chats’, but some MrBeast fans have claimed it’s nothing more than a smear campaign.

In August, it was revealed that MrBeast’s channel suffered a monumental revenue and performance decrease as various controversies surfaced. After the news about Ava Kris Tyson, other participants in MrBeast’s videos came forward to make claims of human rights abuses and poor working conditions while working with the super-sized creator.

It was estimated that in August 2024, amid the scandals, his channel lost around $2.6 million in expected revenue, based on estimations and prior performance.

MrBeast’s team is yet to respond to Rosanna Pansino’s allegations.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that the stage is set for the LoL Worlds finals

item.title: Bilibili and T1 Through To League Worlds Grand Final
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/league-worlds-grand-final-t1-bilibili/

Following an intense knockout stage that has unravelled over two weeks, the grand finalists have been revealed in the League of Legends World Championship 2024. For the trophy, and the $445,000 grand prize, Bilibili and T1 will face off on November 2, live in London at the O2 Arena.

This could be the ultimate opportunity for Faker to secure his fifth world championship title, forever cementing him as one of the greatest esports competitors of all time.

Heavy is the Crown

It has been one hell of a journey to get this far. This year’s League of Legends World Championship event started on September 25, and there’s still just under a week until it’s all wrapped up. When that day comes, either Bilibili Gaming will have claimed its first LoL Worlds trophy, or T1 will have secured its fifth championship.

The last barrier for T1 to get this far was Gen.G, and social media managers were quick to promote the contest between T1’s Faker and Gen.G’s Chovy.

In the numbers, Faker and Chovy are putting out similar win-loss records, and their head-to-head figures over the years have ebbed and flowed dramatically. This year, Chovy was proving to be a thorn in Faker’s side, but when it counted most, Faker was able to gut up and push Chovy and his team out of League Worlds.

In 2022, the pair competed side-by-side during the Asian Games.

Now, all that stands between Faker, T1, and a fifth world championship trophy is Bilibili, an organisation that’s yet to secure a T2 finish at Worlds. Not one member of the all-Chinese team has claimed a League Worlds trophy yet, and despite a lacklustre Swiss Stage, Bilibili has recouped some momentum and stormed through the Knockout Stage.

One series is all it’ll take to decide this year’s champion.

For more Insider Gaming esports, check out the news that Undisputed is eyeing up an esports ecosystem

item.title: Best KSV Loadout in Black Ops 6: Attachments, Perks & Equipment
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/best-ksv-loadout-black-ops-6-attachments-perks-equipment/

The KSV is a meta SMG in Call of Duty Black Ops 6 and gives great results in close-range combat. The best thing about this gun is it’s available early in the game. You can get started with it and tweak the loadout from there on.

However, to get the most out of the weapon, here’s the best KSV loadout in BO6 with the right set of attachments, Perks, and Equipment.

  • Best attachments
  • Best Perks, Wildcard & Equipment
  • Best Secondary for KSV
  • How to unlock KSV in Black Ops 6
  • Is the KSV any good in Black Ops 6?
  • Best alternatives

Best KSV loadout attachments in Black Ops 6

  • Muzzle: Suppressor
  • Barrel: Long Barrel
  • Rear Grip: Quickdraw Grip
  • Stock: Infiltrator Stock
  • Magazine: Flip Mag

Starting with the Suppressor, this attachment not only suppresses the firing sounds but also hides you from the mini-map. It unlocks at level 2 which is very easy to do.

Long Barrel increases the firepower of the SMG by increasing the damage range. It unlocks when the KSV reaches level 3 and helps deal with more damage in medium-range combat. Right after this one, the Quickdraw Grip will unlock at level 6, attach it immediately. This attachment significantly increases the Aim Down Sight speed of the gun and helps you aim faster, enhancing its handling.

The Infiltrator Stock unlocks at level 8 and will improve your mobility by enhancing the Aim Walking Movement Speed. Lastly, get the Flip Mag after reaching weapon level 17 to improve the reload speed of the KSV.

Best Perks, Wildcard & Equipment for KSV

  • Perk 1: Ghost
  • Perk 2: Tracker
  • Perk 3: Cold-Blooded
  • Perk 4: Gung-Ho
  • Wildcard: Perk Greed
  • Lethal: Semtex
  • Tactical: Stim Shot
  • Field Upgrade: Tactical Insertion

Ghost leaves you undetected by Scout Pulse or UAV and Tracker allows you to see enemy footsteps. Use Cold-Blooded as the third Perk to remain undetected under thermal optics. These perks will activate Recon – the ability to see enemies through walls briefly.

Use the fourth Perk slot to equip Gung-Ho. This will increase Sprinting speeds while reloading or using Equipment. Semtex will add more firepower to the loadout while Stim Shot will help you heal up quickly. For the Field Upgrade, use the Tactical Insertion for custom spawn points in the map.

Best Secondary for KSV

The ideal secondary weapon options for the KSV are Stryder .22 and GS45.

How to unlock KSV in Black Ops 6

You can unlock the KSV after reaching player level 7 in Black Ops 6. You don’t need to wait too long for this weapon as only a few multiplayer matches would unlock the weapon and you can start grinding from there on.

Is the KSV any good in Black Ops 6?

Yes, at the time of writing, the KSV is one of the meta weapons in BO6. Although it comes with a high recoil, controlling it is easy and on the positive side, you get a fast TTK and high mobility with it – two crucial aspects for intense multiplayer lobbies.

Best alternatives to the KSV in Black Ops 6

The Jackal PDW is easily one of the best alternatives to the KSV. However, if you want to try something different, a weapon that’s slower but hits hard, give the Tanto .22 a try.

Stay up to date with all the latest news and guides on Black Ops 6 by signing up for Insider Gaming’s weekly newsletter. Since the game has finally dropped, check here how to level up fast in BO6.
